line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1/2 fluid ounce pina colada mix")

line.originaltext: In a mixing glass combine the rum, apricot brandy, fruit punch and pina colada mix.
In a mixing glass combine the rum, apricot brandy, fruit punch and pina colada mix.
Stir to blend and serve over ice.
line.annotation: mix(ing4, t0, ing5, "stirred drink", "stir to blend")

line.originaltext: Stir to blend and serve over ice.
